#Resources for R

## Remember that a lot of help is available directly through RStudio. Packages are continually being updated, so be sure to check from time to time for new functionality.

##Websites


Quick-R                                            http://www.statmethods.net/index.html  

Swirl provides a learning environment in R         http://swirlstats.com/

RStudio has online tutorials and information       http://www.rstudio.com/resources/training/

The R Manuals at CRAN                              http://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html

Advanced R by Hadley Wickham                       http://adv-r.had.co.nz/

R Programming.net has many additional resources    http://rprogramming.net/
